caption:
In this photo, three young adults are engaging in activities on a small boat, which appears to be on a narrow, tree-lined river or canal. The focus is on their relaxed interaction and leisure rather than navigation.

Starting from the left, a young woman with long blonde hair, wearing a dark red shirt and jeans, is seated near the edge of the boat. She is looking away from the camera, drinking from a can possibly soda or beer.

In the center, a young woman with dark hair pulled back, dressed in a mustard yellow top and pants, is sitting as she eats snacks from a small container. Her relaxed posture and casual attire suit the apparent warmth and brightness of the day.

On the right, a young man with short dark hair wearing a light yellow shirt, denim jeans, and sneakers is lounging on a padded boat seat. He is turned towards the center woman, speaking to her and gesturing with his hand that holds a similar snack or food item.

The boat is equipped with casual seating, including red and white bench seats. Around them, various picnic supplies and storage boxes are visible, suggesting preparation for a day trip. The sun illuminates the entire scene, creating a relaxing atmosphere.

In the background, the environment features lush greenery and tranquil waters, enhancing the leisurely ambiance of a warm, sunny day out boating with friends. The canopy of trees on either side frames the river, leading up to what seems like a curve or corner of the channel.

This photograph captures a moment of youthful leisure and companionship in a natural setting, emphasizing simplicity and enjoyment in the great outdoors.
title: School children testing water (from the documerica-1 exhibition.  For other images in this assignment, see fiche number 24
